pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 19, 2016:

Ottawa

8:00 a.m.    The Prime Minister will attend the Canadian Teacher’s Federation breakfast and will hold a Q&A with members of the Canadian Teacher’s Federation.

Canadian Teacher’s Federation
2490 Don Reid Drive 
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled media coverage

9:30 a.m.  The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Notes for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m.   The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m.    The Prime Minister will speak at the iVote event at the University of Ottawa.

University of Ottawa
Room 4007
Faculty of Social Sciences
120 University Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
  • Livestream will be available here: https://www.facebook.com/JustinPJTrudeau/ 

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
